name: USSR 2021
description:
Storyline: In 1987, an unknown object fell on the territory of Siberia. It does not cause serious damage, but after a fall in a radius of 50 kilometers from the epicenter, any connection with all populated areas is completely lost, including radio communication. All expeditions sent to the place of the fall did not return back. Their fate is unknown. It is obvious that people did not die, but did not return back.

The game takes place in 2021. Satellite images revealed numerous anomalous formations in the radius of the fall of the object. To gather information to these anomalies, the Russian authorities send the military from the Special Forces Airborne Forces. The player’s task is to visit the designated sites for collecting samples and leave the radius of the anomalous zone.

Game features:

Huge open world 100 per 100 km.

Fighting with enemies in hand-to-hand combat, with fists and melee weapons, because find bullets and firearms will be difficult.

The main enemies are people. Among people, some will be neutral and will not be the first to attack the player.

The game will not be pharmacies. The only way to quickly restore health is to find a safe place and go to bed. Only during sleep does the game save progress.
